settings.text:
Since 2014, Luna Norte has been offering a wide selection of jewelry and genuine gemstones to customers around the globe. We have a passion for creating timeless styles inspired by natural beauty that embody our core design values: quality, comfort, and affordability.

As our retail partner, you can expect access to our trend forecasting knowledge, and marketing assistance and collateral for use in your storefronts. Get first access to our freshest collections, and the piece of mind that comes with a guarantee of outstanding customer support.

We understand your small business needs to provide affordable products to your customers without compromising on quality. We accomplish this by sourcing the highest quality gemstones while keeping our prices within reach.

Join our community of gemstone collectors, small business owners, trendsetters, and jewelry enthusiasts today!

settings.custom_liquid: Are you international or prefer to shop through Faire?
